titles.title: A bill to enhance the prospects for economic development in rural areas by allowing municipal corporations to acquire through eminent domain utility facilities of rural water supply or sewer service corporations.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

bill.summary: 10/20/1988--Introduced. Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit a municipal corporation or utility to use eminent domain to acquire rural water or sewer associations under specified conditions.
